description.description: Description of the files structure on GCS.

location.description: Location of the files on GCS. */* patterns are supported. {model} can be used and will be replaced by the models listed in the data contract.

file_format.description: Format of the files hosted on GCS. csv, json or parquet are supported.

encryption_key.description: AES 256 symmetric encryption key used to encrypt files at rest - works only for parquet files.

key_id.description: Key id to access the files on Google GCS.

secret.description: Secret to access the files on Google GCS
